Thoughts from Tartarus

This is my older, long-form blog where I infrequently make essay-style posts. The name is a lame twofold joke I have with myself - my poker screenname is "persephoney" and the posts here are usually self-absorbed complaints, as if I feel like I am in a hell of mythological proportion. I promise it's not all whiny though.

  • An open letter to all my friends, ever

    26 Oct 2018 | Personal

  • Experiences with Jekyll

    20 Oct 2018 | Jekyll, Web Development

  • Man vs Food: Whiny Emo Edition

    14 Jun 2018 | Diet & Fitness, Mental Health, Wellbeing

  • But Why?

    23 Apr 2018 | Existentialism, Pseudo-philosophy

  • The Dream is Dead.

    19 Apr 2018 | Career Growth, Poker, Web Development
